page.description: Vertical lines in Free-form Reports can be configure to "grow", allowing them to extend to the full height of the report section containing the vertical line.

discussion.p: Vertical lines have a *[ui:Growable]* property that, when set, will expand the line to the full height of the report section it is in.

section.description: For example, in the report shown below, the vertical line extends the full height of each record in the Detail Section without any gaps between the lines.
